price: Gece de onlar için bir ibret alâmetidir. Biz ondan gündüzü sıyırıp çekeriz de onlar karanlıklara gömülürler.
arabic: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمُ ٱلَّيۡلُ نَسۡلَخُ مِنۡهُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظۡلِمُونَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waāyatun lahumu al-laylu naslakhu min'hu al-nahāra fa-idhā hum muẓ'limūna
